createAuction(bytes32).details: bundleHash must be unique and never reused

params.bundleHash: keccak256 hash of the bundle_id (generated off-chain)

finalizeAuction(bytes32).details: Can be called after reveal window ends or when all bids are revealed

params.salt: The random salt used in commitment

params.newOwner: The address of the new owner

MAX_BIDDERS().notice: Maximum number of bidders per auction

auctionBidders(bytes32,uint256).notice: Array of bidder addresses per auction (for iteration)

commitBid(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Commit a sealed bid for an auction

commitments(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping from bundleHash to bidder address to their commitment

computeCommitmentHash(bytes32,address,ui.notice: Compute commitment hash (helper for off-chain use)

createAuction(bytes32).notice: Create a new auction for a ride bundle

finalizeAuction(bytes32).notice: Finalize an auction and determine the winner

getCommitment(bytes32,address).notice: Get commitment details for a bidder

isBidderWhitelisted(address).notice: Check if a bidder is whitelisted

owner().notice: Owner of the contract (can manage bidders)

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfer ownership to a new address
